events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit at all and is uncomfortable to wear.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request following the customer's explanation of their dissatisfaction due to improper fit and discomfort.
Assigning the case to a customer support representative specialized in refunds and returns for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still has the original tags attached?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket has never been worn outside, and the tags are still intact as you requested.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once you ship the jacket back to us. I will send you a prepaid return label via email shortly.
That sounds great! I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label makes the return process much easier for me.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you were able to ship the jacket back using the label we provided. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I dropped the package off yesterday. Thank you for following up and for the support throughout this process.
Your refund has been processed successfully and the case is now closed. We appreciate your patience and hope to serve you better next time.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback is important to us to improve our services.
